page.title: 17WALROW-ENGINEERING
page.content: THREE LOCAL FIRMS ARE NOW WELL ESTABLISHED ON THIS SITE ENGAGED IN SHEETMETAL FABRICATION.THE LARGEST EMPLOYER,WILLSHER AND QUICK,WAS SET UP IN THE 1950'S BY TWO LOCAL MEN WHO SAW THE NEED FOR THE FABRICATION OF METAL ENCLOSURES.FROM THESE SMALL BEGININGS, THE FIRM HAS GROWN TO BECOME THE SECOND LARGEST LOCAL EMPLOYER.NOT ONLY IS THE FABRICATION CARRIED OUT,BUT ALSO THE MANUFACTURED GOODS ARE DELIVERED IN THE FIRMS OWN LORRIES. FIVE YEARS AGO,TWO SMALLER FIRMS OPENED TO CARRY OUT SIMULAR WORK.THESE HAVE BOTH BECOME WELL ESTABLISHED AND HAVE INCREASED THEIR WORK FORCE. PRECISION ENGINEERING TAKES PLACE IN A SMALL WORKSHOP FOR A BIRMINGHAM MANUFACTURER HERE,EXPENSIVE METALS ARE FABRICATED INTO PARTS FOR CHEMICAL ENGINEERING.
